Extremely good game, full of cheaters, smurfs and toxicity. If you want a better experience play faceit. Even at low ranks it is still better than normal matchmaking.

(Edit: Faceit is even worse than mm, the undying thirst for elo combined with the braindead dogs you encounter (always on your team for some reason) will scar you for life. At least on mm you expect them to be boosted. Go to the gym this shit isnt worth it)
